titleStmt.title: Articles devisid by the holle consent of the kynges moste honourable counsayle, his gracis licence opteined therto, not only to exhorte, but also to enfourme his louynge subiectis of the trouthe.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1509-1547 : Henry VIII)
